short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add sparks as you browse the web. Spark from any website with the Sparks Chrome browser extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whatever you are browsing on the web, you can now add a spark straight from your browser toolbar. Just hit the spark button and type out your notes, thought or insight. Save the spark then add another one straight away. 

Easy. Quick. Convenient.

Capture your learning and grow your knowledge with Sparks.
